PyCitySchools analysis

Using the data gathered on the “District Summary” we can see the following data:
District Summary

Out of the 15 schools the average reading score is higher than the average math score.

School Summary

The school “Bailey High School” has the highest budget being $3,124,928.00.
The school with the highest budget per student is “Huang High School”.
Cabrera High School has the highest percentage of overall passing.
